title: Pym Chair Walk Route

images.title: Philip Halling / Moorland at Pym Chair
images.caption: Moorland at Pym Chair. View across moorland to the north of Pym Chair. The Cheshire/Derbyshire boundary follows this hillside, with much of the moorland in this picture in Derbyshire.

images.caption: The view from Pym's Chair

images.title: The Street at Pym Chair by Gary Rogers, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: The Street at Pym Chair

description: This short circular walk explores the immediate area around the Pym Chair car park on the Derbyshire/Cheshire border in the Peak District National Park. There are many fine hill top walks to do from the elevated position of the car park. The splendid geology at Windgather Rocks is just to the north. There are more fine views from Shining Tor and Cats Tor to the south. To the east there's waterside trails around the lovely Errwood Reservoir and Fernilee Reservoir. There's also some fine heather moorland and peaceful woodland trails to try in this popular walking area.
display_address: Pym Chair, Side End Lane, Kettleshulme and Lyme Handley, High Peak, Cheshire East, East Midlands, England, SK23 7RF, United Kingdom
